column4: can someone go into openoffice writer, go to tools > customize, click on the "shortcut keys" section, press shift+enter and tell me what the command beside it is called?
Your question was answered a while ago -- just look back about 20 entries
I didn't see it, usually stuff that doesn't start with my name zips by me
thanks, for the answer. missed it because it was WXA not WXZ :p
